TopicTitle: KSP RSS/RO doesent work with Realistic progression oneone

Articles.Content: Does anybody know why my ksp 1.3.1 with RSS And RO doesent work with RP-0 or RP-1? I Would really like to play career on real solar system but everytime i start one and launch my first craft, the game teleports me to infinity and resets my funds to zero and the game crashes. Would love to find a fix for that.
